data.actual_result: A message flashes for a second underneath the message box as it closes
data.expected_result: Message box closes smoothly without showing any profile pictures
data.short_description: Profile pictures and messages flash under message box when closing keyboard (easier to see when in a voice call)
data.steps_to_repro: - Scroll up through messages to make sure you have profile pictures and messages under your keyboard - Open up your keyboard - Observe your keyboard to make sure you can see the profile pictures underneath - Close the keyboard and observe the bottom of the message box - You can also test it in a channel with 50+ new messages to guarantee messages being underneath your keyboard (this is how I tested this bug)
